_header: I-blessed be thou lady full of heaven bliss
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — five monorhyming quatrains

BLEge613.First Lines:
blessed beo þu lauedi ful of houene Blissesƿete flur of
                    parais moder of mildernisse…
BLEge613.Last Lines:
…þu do þat ich for hire sake beo imaked so
                    cleneþat ich noht at daii dai of dome beo flemed of þi
                    exsene

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Blessed be þou leuedy ful of heouene blisseSuete flur of
                    parays moder of mildenesse…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…bring vs to þin riche þer is ioie mostlet vs neuer
                    hit misse for non worldes bost
